system.availability: Extends 1.5 metres, has Strength of 75 and Unnatural Strength x2. Can anchor oneself to a suitable point as a Free Action using the limb. Can be used to attack as a Reaction or Standard Attack (can only make one attack per round), deals 2d10+14 I Damage with Pen 10. Exceptional Craftsmanship has 85 Strength and 2d10+16 Damage, and +10 to Grapple Tests.
system.cost: Space Marine only, used by Techmarines
